alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 8:24AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Charlotte and northwestern Lee Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 824 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pineland, or 9 miles west of Cape Coral, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Matlacha, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, Pine Island Center, Palmona Park, St. James City, Burnt Store Marina, Bokeelia, Pirate Harbor, Useppa Island, Suncoast Estates, and North Fort Myers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Lee
